BridgeNetworkOutput.description: The output of the bridge. A network output is delivered to your premises.

The network output protocol.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: rtp-fec | rtp | udp

Required: Yes

Update requires: No interruption

Required: Yes
